entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kenora Airport 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -33.4°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -36.8°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
